Trainer
A team of dedicated trainers, well experienced and certified, in personal training will guide you, step by step, in helping you achieve your goals….
Studio
A place dedicated to you!!! Our well equipped studio is designed to give you ample space and freedom to exercise, at your own pace, under close supervision.
A. Meet your fitness goals
B. Achieve a calm and active lifestyle
C. Learn about your body and mind

Every trainer is different, but so is every client. A personal studio is a place where a one-on-one session can benefit you because there is constant communication between the trainer and you on the importance of the exercises being done and how to perform the exercises correctly.

With the entire space at your disposal and access to all the equipment without waiting for it, can enable the trainer to do workouts alongside their clients to help correct form or  challenge the client.
One of the best fitness studios you can ever come across, lovely atmosphere, well maintained and hygienic.

This Online customized training program is designed for those who want to improve their running or walking posture and strength. If you are someone who likes to workout using weights or resistance band at home or your apartment gym, the Den package is for you.
Working out in a group can be fun and motivating. This program is designed for a small group of 2 to 3 like minded individuals, to work out in our studio.
If you prefer to workout alone and at your own pace, then this option would suit you

KR Fitness Studio is your partner in achieving your health and fitness aspirations. We specialise in providing excellent personal training to meet your goals be it transformation ( Bulking & Fat loss ) or Strength & Conditioning, irrespective of your current physical condition. KR Fitness is a destination that encourages you to re-discover the strength of your own Mind and body.

Meet the driving force behind KR Fitness Studio - Founder and lead trainer Keerthi Raj. With an unwavering passion for fitness and a commitment to personal well-being, I am certified in various aspects of fitness and bring a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the fitness industry.
Our clients wear joyful smiles, reflecting their satisfaction with our exceptional service and transformational fitness experiences. Happy faces, happy clients.
We focus on personalized attention, tailored workouts, and a close-knit community, ensuring your fitness journey is unique, effective, and enjoyable.
We conduct a thorough assessment and consider your goals, preferences, and any limitations to craft a custom workout plan that maximizes your progress.
The frequency of sessions depends on your goals and availability. We’ll work with you to create a schedule that best suits your needs and aspirations.
We provide personalized nutrition plans and guidance to complement your fitness routine, ensuring a holistic approach to achieving your desired results.
We use various assessment tools and regular check-ins to monitor your progress, adjust your plan, and celebrate your achievements on your fitness journey.
